Title: Requires the foreclosing party in a residential foreclosure action to offer a refinancing opportunity to the mortgagor
Summary: Requires the foreclosing party in a residential foreclosure action to offer a refinancing opportunity to the mortgagor.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to requiring the foreclosing party in a residential foreclosure action to offer a refinancing opportunity to the mortgagor
